list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: of the required type; suitable or appropriate.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an artist needs the proper tools
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một nghệ sĩ cần các công cụ thích hợp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: belonging or relating exclusively or distinctively to; particular to.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the two elephant types proper to Africa and to southern Asia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting a subset or subgroup that does not constitute the entire set or group, especially one that has more than one element.
the part of a church service that varies with the season or festival.
